title: Obari
author: Obari
content: Recently I just got a deal and the seller wants to use http://bitify.com as a possible escrow, I wish to know If anyone is familiar with bitify and please wats the authencity?:. Please pardon me if this isn't the right thread for this question as I really just wanted to know if there are real humans with real reviews as I also don't want to risk anything while not wanting to lose this deal as well.Thanks as I will value all responses.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: I do not know if what you want to trade or exchange is bitcoin or something else. If it is bitcoin, I will advise you to use any merchant in our local board or you do it through p2p on Binance. This two options will set your mind at peace until your transaction goes through.Moving your thread to the Reputation board will be better and gives you more visibility than leaving it in the Service section.

comments.author: Usdt2023
comments.body: Yes I used bitfiy and it's good for escrow you can use it without problem it's safe

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Thank you all for your suggestions and I wanted to help trade gift card E-codes and the seller wanted us use  that very escrow but since I wasn't conversant with it, I had to opt out rather than having au regrets later since most scammers aren't relenting on their works, so I had to stay safe.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on March 27, 2023, 07:07:24 PMRecently I just got a deal and the seller wants to use http://bitify.com as a possible escrow, I wish to know If anyone is familiar with bitify and please wats the authencity?In terms of escrow, I used them many times during the year 2018 to 2021, the company was registered in Australia and I have not heard of problems related to them escrow service or that you were scam if you follow the site’s rules.The only pending privacy, if you intend to sell or buy any product that may be illegal in any country or may cause a problem for you, it is better to avoid them, they share personal data what they are asked for.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: So far, this is only site i think had never linked to scam issues in terms of their escrow service. Never used them personally but i didn't heard any bad review or major issue using them as well. So i could assume they are still as good as them just like before.
